contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 26, 1998 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium - Treherbert. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £40. 8 bands competed
May 6, 2015, 12:42 p.m. July 3, 2020, 3:36 p.m.
1 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard The Plantagenets
2 Newport Borough Band R. Adams Partita [unknown composer]
3 Ebbw Vale Band Bernard Williams Three Miniatures [Sparke]
4 Pontypool Brass Robert Burnett Blackfriars
5 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne Labour and Love
6 Ammanford Silver Band D. G. Baldwin Coriolanus
7 Ynyshir Band F. W. Nicholas Suite Gothique
8 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band J. Wynne Williams Prometheus Unbound
Withdrawn Pontardulais Town Band C. Brian Buckley
